body: This is the sequel to The D’Evil Diaries. Tomasina Covelli is a 10 year-old girl who lives in Dark Angel Palace in Hell with Satan and his son Jinx. All of the other demons are out to get her until Jinx’s creepy step-mum comes up with a way for her to fit in - a competition. But is it all that it seems? This is a great sequel to The D’Evil Diaries and I actually liked this one the most. There are lots of bits in it that make me laugh. I liked this book so much I wish there was a third one!         Recommended reading age: 9 yrs and above. You will like this book if you like: The D’Evil Diaries. It made me laugh a lot. Want to tell the world about a book you’ve read? Join the site and send us your review!
webTitle: The D’Evil Diaries: Hell's Belles by Tatum Flynn - review
